answers.answer: Hi, the probable causes for your symptoms are scabies, diabetes mellitus, eczema, tineapedis (fungal infection) and psoriasis. Scabies infection is caused by a mite Sarcoptes Scabiei, it burrows in the skin folds of hands and feet and causes intense itching mostly at night. You may need to consult a Dermatologist who will examine you and may ask for blood tests and in addition examine the scrapings from the skin to arrive at a diagnosis for appropriate therapy. Regards.

question: Hi! I am 39 years of age. Sufferings nostrils and ear parasites that crawling, biting sensation in my ear ,nose, arms and being much worse at night. I also began to have flu-like symptoms, fever, chills, muscle/joint aches, extreme fatigue, etc. Best Regards.
title: nostrils and ear parasites
